bibl.title: A Study of Coptic Pottery from Kharga Oasis.
bibl.note: Late Roman ware from Kharga Oasis (fourth and fifth centuries A.D.). - I. Plain Red Ware. - II. Painted Pottery from Kharga.
SHAHEEN Baheya, A Study of Coptic Pottery from Kharga Oasis.

Nicola BONACASA, Maria CASINI e Ahmed ETMAN (a cura di), Maria CASINI (redazione), The Culture of the Oasis from the Antiquity to the Modern Age. El Kharga, 22-27 October 1998. IV Italo-Egyptian Forum. [Atti del IV Congresso Internazionale Italo-Egiziano] (Cairo, s.d.) pp. 137-145.
